issues.title: Border Security
issues.description: Strong supporter of stricter border control and immigration enforcement, advocating for complete border wall construction and increased border patrol funding

issues.title: Fiscal Responsibility
issues.description: Supports reducing government spending, opposing large federal budget expansions, and implementing balanced budget amendments

issues.title: Anti-Socialism Stance
issues.description: Vocal critic of socialist policies, drawing from her Ukrainian immigrant background to argue against government overreach

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Strong defender of gun ownership rights, opposing additional gun control legislation

issues.title: Ukraine Support
issues.description: Advocates for strong US military and financial support for Ukraine against Russian aggression, drawing from personal family history

issues.title: Healthcare Deregulation
issues.description: Supports reducing healthcare regulations, promoting market-based healthcare solutions and opposing government-run healthcare systems

issues.title: School Choice
issues.description: Advocates for expanding school choice programs, charter schools, and parental control in education

issues.title: Pro-Life Position
issues.description: Strong opponent of abortion, supports restrictions on reproductive rights and defunding of abortion providers
